com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Am3Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Am3Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl

    public class Am3Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl, UpDeviceControl
    Public API for the AM3

    The class provides methods to control AM3 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a AM3 device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new AM3 device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect AM3 device.

        activityLevel - 1 Sedentary,2 Active,3 Very active
